pages.title: Memories
pages.text: With the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l), you are able to breathe new life into a once dead creature.$(br)It will materialise in the form of a $(italic)Memory$().

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: To remember the memories about a creature, you need its $(l:creating_life/mob_heads)Head$(/l), as well as its most beloved item and $(l:creating_life/fading#vegetal)Vegetal$(/l) as a bonding agent.$(br)Using $(l:creating_life/failing#neolith)Neolith$(/l) seems to completely overpower the energies of the creature, making the resulting Memory unrecognizable, until it manifests.

pages.title: Manifesting
pages.text: Memories need a certain amount of time to manifest, almost like an egg: you have to place them down and wait. Depending on the creature, it may be reasonably quick, or take forever.$(br2)$(italic)Placing them on top of certain blocks seems to speed up that process or stop it entirely.
